thread.title: Donald Trump says Washington should keep team name
thread.title_full: Donald Trump says Washington should keep team name - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Donald Trump says Washington should keep team name
text:
Jose Luis Magana/AP The Washington team name controversy is a non-issue according to Donald Trump. Continuing his penchant for making controversial remarks, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump says the Washington NFL team should keep its offensive nickname as long as team owner Dan Snyder wants to.
"Honestly, I don't think they should change the name, unless the owner wanted to," Trump told the New York Times .
Trump feels the debate surrounding the name is an "issue of unnecessary political correctness," the Times wrote , and Trump said the name isn't considered a slur by everyone.
"I know Indians that are extremely proud of that name," Trump said. "They think it's a positive."
This comes a week after fellow GOP candidate Jeb Bush made similar comments in an interview on Sirius XM Radio.
Patrick Semansky/AP Several Native American groups have called for Washington to change its team's controversial name. "I don't think the team should change it," Bush said. "I don't find it offensive. Native American tribes generally don't find it offensive." He later added "I must be missing something here I guess."
The Change the Mascot campaign released a statement responding to Trump's comments.
"It is hardly surprising that a candidate who labeled Mexican immigrants rapists and calls women "pigs" now says he wants the NFL to continue slurring Native Americans," the statement said. "Donald Trump joins some of the NFL's ignoble fraternity of billionaires who sit in their office suites and owners boxes happily spending their fortunes denigrating people of color."
Related Stories Jeb Bush: I don’t find Washington NFL team name offensive Harry Reid hits NFL over 'racist' Washington team name Washington team name not considered profane on the air: FCC Senator: Strip NFL of tax-exempt status for not pushing Washington team to change name
